00025 BOOLEAN HandleStrategicDeath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00026 {
00027       // add the guy to the dead list
00028       //AddCharacterToDeadList( pSoldier );
00029 
00030   // If in a vehicle, remove them!
00031       if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment == VEHICLE ) && ( pSoldier->iVehicleId != -1 ) )
00032       {
00033             // remove from vehicle
00034             TakeSoldierOutOfVehicle( pSoldier );
00035   }
00036 
00037       // if not in mapscreen
00038       if ( !(guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN ) )
00039       {
00040             // ATE; At least make them dead!
00041             if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
00042             {
00043                   SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
00044             }
00045 
00046             ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_DEAD );
00047       }
00048       else if( ( pSoldier -> bLife == 0 )&&( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
00049       {
00050             // died in mapscreen
00051             
00052             fReDrawFace = TRUE;
00053 
00054             // dead
00055             if( ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
00056             {
00057                   SetTimeOfAssignmentChangeForMerc( pSoldier );
00058             }
00059 
00060             ChangeSoldiersAssignment( pSoldier, ASSIGNMENT_DEAD );
00061 
00062             //s et breath and breath max to 0
00063             pSoldier -> bBreath = pSoldier->bBreathMax = 0;
00064 
00065             // rebuild list
00066             ReBuildCharactersList( );
00067 
00068             // ste merc as dead
00069             // pSoldier->fUIdeadMerc = TRUE;
00070       
00071             // attempt o remove character from squad
00072             RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
00073             
00074             // handle any passign comments by grunts
00075             HandleSoldierDeadComments( pSoldier );
00076             
00077             // put the dead guys down
00078             AddDeadSoldierToUnLoadedSector( ( UINT8 ) ( pSoldier->sSectorX ), ( UINT8 )( pSoldier->sSectorY ), pSoldier->bSectorZ, pSoldier, RandomGridNo(), ADD_DEAD_SOLDIER_TO_SWEETSPOT );               
00079 
00080             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00081             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00082             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00083 
00084             StopTimeCompression();
00085       }
00086 
00087       return( TRUE );
00088 }

00091 void HandleSoldierDeadComments( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00092 {
00093       INT32 cnt = 0;
00094       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
00095       INT8 bBuddyIndex;
00096 
00097       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
00098       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
00099 
00100       
00101       // see if this was the friend of a living merc
00102       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
00103       {       
00104             if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive )
00105             {
00106                   bBuddyIndex = WhichBuddy( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile );
00107                   switch( bBuddyIndex )
00108                   {
00109                         case 0:
00110                               // buddy #1 died!
00111                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_BUDDY_ONE_KILLED );
00112                               break;
00113                         case 1:
00114                               // buddy #2 died!
00115                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_BUDDY_TWO_KILLED );
00116                               break;
00117                         case 2:
00118                               // learn to like buddy died!
00119                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_LEARNED_TO_LIKE_MERC_KILLED );
00120                               break;
00121                         default:
00122                               break;
00123                         }
00124                   }
00125             }
00126 
00127 
00128       return;
00129 }
